events.name: Lithium-ion battery supply chain risk assessment
events.wd_label: Lithium-ion battery supply chain risk assessment
events.wd_description: Comprehensive assessment of supply risks across the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on mining, refining, and manufacturing stages.
events.description: Comprehensive assessment of supply risks across the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain, focusing on mining, refining, and manufacturing stages.

events.name: Supply risk generalization
events.wd_description: Generalizing the concept of supply risk to encompass the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain, beyond just the mining stage.
events.description: Generalizing the concept of supply risk to encompass the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain, beyond just the mining stage.

events.name: Mining stage risks
events.wd_description: Identifying and assessing supply risks at the mining stage of lithium-ion battery materials.
events.description: Identifying and assessing supply risks at the mining stage of lithium-ion battery materials.

events.name: Refining stage risks
events.wd_description: Evaluating supply risks during the refining stage of lithium-ion battery materials.
events.description: Evaluating supply risks during the refining stage of lithium-ion battery materials.

events.name: Manufacturing stage risks
events.wd_description: Assessing supply risks inherent in the manufacturing stage of lithium-ion battery materials.
events.description: Assessing supply risks inherent in the manufacturing stage of lithium-ion battery materials.

events.name: Critical materials identification
events.wd_description: Identifying lithium and cobalt as the most critical materials for the lithium-ion battery industry.
events.description: Identifying lithium and cobalt as the most critical materials for the lithium-ion battery industry.

events.name: Lithium supply
events.wd_description: Evaluating the supply risks associated with lithium, a critical material for lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: Evaluating the supply risks associated with lithium, a critical material for lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: Cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Assessing the supply risks linked to cobalt, essential for lithium-ion battery production.
events.description: Assessing the supply risks linked to cobalt, essential for lithium-ion battery production.

events.name: Downstream risks
events.wd_description: Highlighting the risks in the downstream stages of nickel and manganese within the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Highlighting the risks in the downstream stages of nickel and manganese within the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Nickel supply risks
events.wd_description: Identifying and assessing supply risks related to nickel in the downstream stages of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Identifying and assessing supply risks related to nickel in the downstream stages of the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Manganese supply risks
events.wd_description: Evaluating supply risks associated with manganese in the downstream stages of lithium-ion battery production.
events.description: Evaluating supply risks associated with manganese in the downstream stages of lithium-ion battery production.

events.name: Comprehensive risk safeguarding
events.wd_description: Emphasizing the need to identify and safeguard against risks comprehensively throughout the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Emphasizing the need to identify and safeguard against risks comprehensively throughout the entire lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Risk identification
events.wd_description: Identifying risks throughout the entire supply chain of lithium-ion batteries to ensure steady consumption.
events.description: Identifying risks throughout the entire supply chain of lithium-ion batteries to ensure steady consumption.

events.name: Safeguarding strategies
events.wd_description: Developing strategies to safeguard against identified risks in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Developing strategies to safeguard against identified risks in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Database establishment
events.wd_description: Calling for the establishment and analysis of comprehensive databases to monitor and manage supply chain risks.
events.description: Calling for the establishment and analysis of comprehensive databases to monitor and manage supply chain risks.
